# When to use Azure App Services Web Apps
Azure App Service is an HTTP-based service that lets you build and host apps.

![Design for Azure App Service Solutions](../images/design-for-azure-app-service-solutions.png){.center .image-large}

- Web apps, background jobs, mobile backends, and RESTful APIs.
- Use the programming language of your choice.
- Automatic scaling and high availability.
- App Service enables automated deployments from GitHub, Azure DevOps, or other source control services.
